General.Name: Ray Co. Ltd
General.Description: RAY Co., Ltd. provides x-ray imaging solutions in the dental and medical industry. The company offers RAYSCAN a+, a digital imaging solution; RAYSCAN a, a dental imaging system; RAYSCAN m+, an imaging solution for ENT specialists; RIOScan, a digital imaging plate system; RIOSensor, an intraoral sensor; RAYDENT, a digital solution for the production of dental appliances; RAYDENT Microscan, a micro-CT 3D scanner for dental CAD/CAM treatment; and RAYDENT Studio, a solution for digital dentistry. It serves customers in approximately 50 countries worldwide. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Seongnam, South Korea.
